result.execSummary:
Jeris Lee Hoppe was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Jeris Lee Hoppe was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jeris Lee Hoppe

defendant.name: Hoppe, Jeris Lee
defendant.address: 1005 Western Avenue N., St. Paul, MN 55117

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: signed by SRN and Def. this date. eif

CO: SRN, RPR: Vicki Kasten, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Matthew L Hartung,  DF ATTY:  Joseph R. Caton,  DF:  Jeris Lee Hoppe appeared from jail. Defendant has a felony warrant out of Washington Co. MN.  Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives extradition. Court questions Defendant and swears him in. SRN and Defendant sign waiver. Defendant to be held without bail until 8/7/15.  Bail/bond hearing scheduled for August 7, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
